name: Viktor Bunin | Coinbase
description: Viktor Bunin leads the Protocol Operations team at Coinbase, the largest staking infrastructure provider. He is the industryâ€™s first Protocol Specialist, a role he created as an early employee of Bison Trails (acq by Coinbase) that has now become an industry staple at orgs like a16z and Blockdaemon.
